source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_00<tab>Etgar seems to be in a state of some excitement this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_00<tab>ワインポートのエトガルは、冒険者にお使いを頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_01<tab>Etgar has told you that Master Byrglaent has hired a miniaturist for the creation of a new wine label. Go and meet the artist at the Raincatcher Gully docks to inform him that the master vintner awaits his arrival.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_01<tab>ビルギレントはワインのラベルに自らの肖像を描きこむため、画家を雇ったらしい。船着場：レインキャッチャーに「ウルダハの細密画家」を迎えに行こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken with the renowned Ul'dahn artist and directed him to Wineport. Return to Etgar to ensure that the miniaturist arrived safely.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_02<tab>ウルダハの細密画家は急いでワインポートに向かってくれそうだ。ワインポートの「エトガル」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_03<tab>Etgar is over the moon at the arrival of the artist, and is thrilled at the prospect of seeing Master Byrglaent's beatific image captured by the painter. The master vintner is clearly a man of great charisma.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_SEQ_03<tab>ビルギレントのワインに対するこだわりは、ずいぶん徹底したもののようだ。そんな彼に、エトガルは心酔しているらしい。
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_TODO_01<tab>ワインポートのエトガルに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_000<tab>The étiquettes─pardon me, wine labels to laymen such as yourself─used by our winery always bear the noble countenance of Master Byrglaent himself.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_000このワイナリーには、ワインのエチケット……
つまりボトルに貼られているラベルに、ビルギレント様の
麗しき肖像画を描くしきたりがあるのですぅ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_001<tab>As such, our esteemed vintian has invited a famed Ul'dahn miniaturist─oh, very well known, probably the most famous miniaturist in all the land─to fashion a label truly worthy of a classic vintage. And he is due to arrive today.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_001そろそろ、その肖像画を描く細密画家が、
はるか遠くウルダハから到着する予定なのですがぁ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_002<tab>I beg you, won't you go down to the Raincatcher Gully docks and meet him? I fear he will be quite mobbed by admirers, and I'd not have him molested, at least until the portrait is done!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_002あなた、「レインキャッチャー」の船着場まで行って、
細密画家を迎えにいってくれませんかねぇ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_010<tab>Yes, I'm the miniaturist. Pardon me if I do not give you my name─I travel incognito, such is my fame. Ah, Master Byrglaent awaits? I will fly to him forthwith!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_010ええ、たしかに私は細密画家ですが……。
ビルギレントさんが待ってるって？
は、はい！　今、行きますです！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_011<tab>We have much to discuss, the master and I. Our artistic differences are many and sundry, yet...yet I cannot resist returning for another étiquette. He is a model in a thousand, that one.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_011……はぁ、あの人、注文が多いんだよなぁ。
エチケットはワイナリーの顔ですよ！
最高のワインには、最高の私の絵を描きなさいってさ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_015<tab>What painter would not wish to sojourn in the sunshine, where wine flows as freely as conversation with a brilliant patron?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_NPCA_000_015さて、せっかく来たんだから、
美味しいワインをお土産にでもしますかねぇ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_020<tab>Our expert in étiquettes has just been by! Simply marvelous! I shall order the chilled white taken to his quarters at once.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_020……今からこちらに来るんですねぇ。
ありがとうごさいましたぁ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_021<tab>Ah, how sweet it is to have the miniaturist here again! It has been full five years, for the Calamity stripped our vines. Our first bottling in half a decade, and oh, to see the master's beatific visage captured again!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB303_00844_ETGAR_000_021霊災から苦節5年……ようやくできた今年のワインに、
ビルギレント様の麗しい姿が描かれる……。
うぅぅん、素晴らしい美の競演ですぅ。
